question: Maharashtra was the host of Khelo India Youth Games of which year?
explanation: Maharashtra was the host of Khelo India Youth Games 2019. It also topped that year with a total number of 228 medals (85 Golds, 62 Silver, 81 Bronze). Khelo India Youth Games 2018 was hosted by Delhi and 2020 edition was hosted by Guwahati, Assam.
